SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.game

Class PlayerInitialConfig

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.PlayerInitialConfig
public class PlayerInitialConfig extends Object
Represents the initial configuration of a player in the game, including their starter card, objectives, and choices made during setup.

    • setChosenStarterSide

      public void setChosenStarterSide(boolean choice) throws PlayerExceptions
      Sets the chosen side of the starter card.
      Parameters:
      choice - The chosen side of the starter card.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If it's not the appropriate time to choose the starter card or if the starter card side has already been chosen.

    • setChosenObjective

      public void setChosenObjective(int choice) throws PlayerExceptions
      Sets the chosen objective card.
      Parameters:
      choice - The index of the chosen objective card.
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - If the choice is not valid (0 or 1).
      PlayerExceptions - If it's not the appropriate time to choose the objective card or if the objective card has already been chosen.

    • setStarterCard

      public void setStarterCard(StarterCard s)
      Sets the starter card for the player.
      Parameters:
      s - The starter card to be set.

    • setObjectives

      public void setObjectives(Objective[] objs)
      Sets the objectives available for the player to choose from.
      Parameters:
      objs - An array of objectives to be set.

    • getStarterSide

      public Boolean getStarterSide()
      Gets the chosen side of the starter card.
      Returns:
      The chosen side of the starter card (true for front, false for back).
